metadata.name: Easy Mode
metadata.description:
Easy Mode Mod Reduce game difficulty by slowing down enemies and projectiles
======================================== Chinese 中文介绍 ======================================== 通过降低敌人和投射物速度来减少《以撒的结合：忏悔》游戏难度的模组。 支持自定义配置，适合想要轻松游玩的玩家。
======================================== English 英文介绍 ======================================== A mod that reduces game difficulty by slowing down enemies and projectiles. Features customizable settings for players who want a more relaxed gaming experience.
======================================== Features 功能特性 ======================================== - 速度控制 - 敌人移动速度降低 60%，Boss 降低 30% Speed Control - Enemy movement speed reduced by 60%, Boss by 30% - 投射物减速 - 投射物速度降低约 5%，射程减少约 10% Projectile Slowdown - Projectile speed reduced by ~5%, range reduced by ~10% - 炸弹延时 - 炸弹爆炸延迟延长 50% Bomb Delay - Bomb explosion delay extended by 50% - 自定义配置 - 可调整各项参数，适应不同难度需求 Custom Configuration - Adjust parameters for different difficulty levels - 智能过滤 - 玩家和友好单位不受影响 Smart Filtering - Player and friendly units are unaffected
======================================== Configuration 配置 ======================================== 编辑 config.lua 文件自定义难度。 Edit config.lua file to customize difficulty.
详细配置说明请见 GitHub Repository: https://github.com/EmptyEmeraldTablet/EasyModeMod
======================================== Tags 标签 ======================================== - Gameplay - Difficulty - Quality of Life
